text: Leif Sigurd Solheim (born July 14, 1932) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1952. He was awarded Gullpucken as best Norwegian ice hockey player in 1959. He is a brother of Olympian ice hockey player Øivind Solheim. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Furuset Ishockey players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Leif Solheim
